title: Nerf VR Gun Controller

description.text: Shoot in real life, shoot in game. Reload in real life, reload in game. Melee in real life, melee in game. Aim in real life, aim in game...

bulletPoints: Turned a Nerf gun to a gun controller for PC, Xbox, PS4 games which acts as a mouse and keyboard using Arduino
Pull the trigger in real life, it'll shoot in game
Reload in real life, it'll reload in game
Use the buttons and thumb stick to walk, jump, interact...
Melee in real life, it'll melee in game, check the video for more details
